name: Pulsemon
description: Pulsemon resembles a small bright chartreuse and black striped animal similar to a Hedgehog with quills at the back of its head, a white muzzle shaped mouth, a black lightning marking on its head, back and arms, lime green eyes, a yellow and white, lightning shaped fringe which moves depending on its mood, a small bit of emerald green fur on his chest, with yellow fur surrounding it, three fingers with claws on each end, a black lightning shaped tail with an emerald green end and it wears on black and green shoes with claws on the ends of them.
